title: Role-Play-Based Discussion Learning Program for Strengthening Scientific Translation Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic translation skills and understanding of fundamental terminology in science and technology fields
context.additional_context: An intensive short-term course for current practitioners to improve scientific translation skills, combining blended learning (online role-play simulations and offline group discussions).

learning_goals: Learners can produce translations that accurately convey the core content of scientific documents.
Learners can provide multifaceted feedback on the translation process and perform collaborative revisions through role-playing.
Learners can conduct critical evaluations of translation outputs and propose quality improvement strategies.

resources: Science Field Source Text and Translation Samples
Online Collaboration Tools (Google Docs, Padlet, etc.)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
